data.eml:eml: Taxonomic Revision of Hispaniola Tiger Beetles in the Genus Brasiella Rivalier 1954 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Cicindelinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Acciavatti, Robert E. (2011): Taxonomic Revision of Hispaniola Tiger Beetles in the Genus Brasiella Rivalier 1954 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Cicindelinae). ZooKeys 147: 99-182, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.147.2012, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.147.2012
